edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.dao

类 ProductionConnectionDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.dao.ProductionConnectionDriver
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IConnectionDriver

    public class ProductionConnectionDriver
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConnectionDriver
    Produces the JDBC connection from Tomcat's JDBC connection pool (defined in context.xml). Produces and exception when running the unit tests because they're not being run through Tomcat.
    作者:
    Andy
